actions.text: On agreeing to the Upton amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 428 - 0 (Roll no. 53).

description: Amendment requires the Coast Guard to continue to offer assistance to organizations dedicated to Great Lakes lighthouse stewardship and to release information regarding the timing of designations of Coast Guard lighthouses on the Great Lakes as surplus property.
purpose: An amendment to continue to require that the Coast Guard offer assistance to organizations dedicated to Great Lakes lighthouse stewardship and to release information regarding the timing of designations of Coast Guard lighthouses on the Great Lakes as surplus property.
